# SimpleFly

Adds fly to the players

## Commands
```yml
/fly            # Toggles Fly for the player
/fly <player>   # Toggles Fly for a specific players
/fly all        # Toggles Fly for all players
/fly version    # Shows the version of Plugin

```
## Build
```yml
./gradlew build
```
